article_title: FSA rule change drives double-digit growth
article_text:
Last year's change to the longstanding use-it-or-lose-it rule for flexible spending accounts is driving double-digit enrollment growth.

Alegeus Technologies said this week that clients who have actively promoted the FSA rollover allowance to their employer groups and eligible employees are seeing 11 percent incremental growth in FSA enrollment and 9 percent growth in FSA elections — compared to a flat overall FSA market growth.
